original_text: And of Gad he said, Blessed be he that enlargeth Gad: he dwelleth as a lion, and teareth the arm with the crown of the head.
korean_text: 갓에 대하여는 일렀으되 갓을 광대하게 하시는 이에게 찬송을 부를지어다 갓이 암사자 같이 엎드리고 팔과 정수리를 찢는도다

sentences.original_text: Blessed be he that enlargeth Gad
and teareth the arm with the crown of the head
